description: When creating a grazing platter for a crowd, pile it high. Opt for creamy cheeses, thinly sliced meats, fresh fruit, mixed nuts and a variety of crackers.
name: Ultimate deluxe platter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 125g Always Fresh crustini crispbread rosemary & sea salt
170g King Island surprise bay cheddar or stokes point cheddar
200g King Island cape wickham double brie cheese

recipeInstructions.text: Using a large platter, add the brie, blue cheese and cheddar.
Next, layout slices of prosciutto and salami.
Add the mixed nuts, sundried tomatoes and quince paste to separate bowls and place them on the board, then add the strawberries, figs and slices of pear.
Finally, complete your board by filling any empty spaces with crackers. Put the crispbreads in a tall glass or jar and place it next to your board.
